info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:47PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lea County through 330 PM MDT... At 247 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Caprock to 13 miles northeast of Maljamar to 20 miles west of Eunice Airport. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lovington, Tatum, McDonald, Crossroads and Tatum Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
